brand.name: ABS Immo Services
brand.description: Nu ngi dimbali sunuy jëfandikukat ci jënd, jaay ak investismaŋ kër ak yoonu premium, siru ak xel.

positioning.title: Sunuy Yoonu Liggéey
positioning.text: Nu moy ñi xam kër yu dëkk ak investismaŋ yu am doole, di jox ndimbal bu ñu defare ngir jëfandikukat yu am yéene.

hero.title: ABS Immobilier
hero.subtitle: Vision bu bees ci immobilier bu am solo, ak kersa ak liggéey bu rafet.

story.s1: Nu ngi sos expérience immobilière yu am solo.
story.s2: Rafet du tànn. Moo di sunu signature.

global.title: Nu am présence internationale
global.text: Dakar, Paris ak Dubaï, nu ngi toppatoo client yi ak opportunité yu am solo ak stratégie.

hero.description: Nu di toppatoo ay jëfandikukat ci jënd ay kër ak suuf yu am solo ci Senegaal ak ci biti réew.

analysis.title: Xam-xam bu baax
analysis.text: Saytu marché bi bu baax ngir gis ay furs yu gën a rafet.

security.title: Wóor gi
security.text: Jëf yu am yoon ak wóor ngir am jàmm ak leer.

execution.title: Jëf bu am solo
execution.text: Nu toppatoo la ba ci jeexital sa projet.

cta.title: Waxtaanal ak nun ci sa projet
cta.text: Waccal nu sa projet immobilier ngir nu dimbali la bu baax.

hero.label: Kolleksioŋ Bu Rafet
hero.description: Gis ay kër yu am solo, yu ñu tann ak teey ngir seen jëfandikoo, fu nekk ak seen doole.

empty.title: Amul kër bu méngoo ak li nga seet.

propertyDetail.whatsappMessage: Asalaam maleekum, dama bëgg kër "{{title}}" bi muy {{price}} milyoŋ FCFA. Ndax mën nga ma jox xibaar yu gën a bari?
